overview:
Jonathan Shneidman is a world class convergent design architect and producer.

With over 20 years experience in entertainment and interactive design, Mr. Shneidman holds multiple patents and is pioneering the next generation of interactive devices and UI design.

Prior to starting Unify Convergent Solutions, He founded one of the premier graphic design and production companies in Hollywood where he oversaw the production of hundreds of high end interactive products for MGM, Sony, Warner Brothers, Perry Ferrel, Divx, and Universal.

Past associations also include Oracle, Seachange and Vestax.

As an engineer, Mr. Shneidman has led teams involved with the building of revolutionary convergent form factors including Smart Phones, All in One devices, next generation TV’s and DJ interfaces. He is soon launching Blu-Audio, A new high end audiophile digital format.

Mr. Shneidman has given talks on UI design and Entertainment at the USC Marshal School of Business, UCLA Anderson School of Management, The University of Wisconsin-Madison School of Business, Otis College of Art and Design, The Art Center College of Design and is a member of ixDA.

As a social entrepreneur he promotes vegetarianism, bicycle commuting, civil rights education for teenagers and audiophile listening rooms for museums.

He is currently working on a instructional parenting DVD with the help of his 8 year old daughter and her friends.
